suppress.notes: https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2020-8022 marks it as vulnerable as it has version ranges for both tomcat 8 and 9.
https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-0956 and https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2013-4390 have very broad cpes and match e.g. the sling servlet annotations
